Author: AvantGardeRatings
Title: â­ã€ANNã€‘â­ã€ICOã€‘â­AvantGarde Ratings - The leading cryptocurrency rating agency
Body: As of yet, the AVG 50 is free to use and all the information about the portfolio components and how to build it are in our whitepaper. This was done to act as a "trial" product and also expose the current state of the market where most other companies that have indices claim to provide a "safe" investment and diversification while in fact they do not.  50% of the AVG 50 is currently designed to hedge (go against) the other 50% highly correlated cryptocurrency exposure. This is done in such a way to mitigate the market downturns whilst still remaining competitive in bullish periods. This is not to say, however, that the current weights (% allocations) in each asset will remain the same. In fact, especially in the cryptocurrency market, factors tend to shift rapidly and so should the AVG 50 react to suit the current movements.  Finally, we will be rebalancing the portfolio and the updated version will be available on the 5th of April. It will be still free to use.

Author: AvantGardeRatings
Title: â­ã€ANNã€‘â­ã€ICOã€‘â­AvantGarde Ratings - The leading cryptocurrency rating agency
Body: AvantGarde Ratings         WEBSITE        The worldâ€™s best cryptocurrency and blockchain ratings agency.   Who are we?     AvantGarde Ratings is acting as a market intelligence platform that provides transparent and sound investment options as well as indices for the cryptocurrency market performance.    We believe that the cryptocurrency market is here to stay. Thatâ€™s why we are addressing the issue with trust and stability.          How do we do it?   Our AVG 50 is a market cap weighted portfolio comprising of 50 cryptocurrencies/tokens. 50% of our portfolio is allocated to our smart hedging mechanic while the remaining 50% are market capitalization weighted.   We look at fundamental value drivers from each asset such as trading volume, size, company stability, management and more to decide whether a given token should be a part of the portfolio.            How are we different from others in the business?   The AVG 50 is a portfolio that aims to maximize returns while minimizing risk. We approached the portfolio problem in a different way. The portfolio uses a 50% hedging mechanism by placing half of the assets in DGD and USDT.     Returns are down -32%     Returns areup 20.1%    What is our mission?  -getting rid of adverse systematic risk  -building trust and transparency  -ensuring investorsâ€™ protection  -exposing fake projects and empty promises  -no management fees and commissions        Our roadmap  Q2     (June) 2017 team gathered around the idea  Q3     2017 initial investments, calculations and     portfolio testing started  Q2     2018 Token distribution event, advertising,     listing on exchanges  Q3     2018 expanding the team and continuing     development of market intelligence platform  Q4     2018 cryptocurrency and blockchain rating     business launch  Q1     2019 launch of a digital asset fund and     financial services  Q3     2019 market intelligence platform launch for     end customers      Token sale Information           Business plan        Start date: April 9, 2018 20:00 GMT+2  End date: April 30, 2018 20:00 GMT+2    Payments received: ETH  Token price: 1 ETH=3000 AVG  Maximum cap: $7 000 000    Limits:  Minimum - 0.05 ETH  Maximum - No limit  Tokens for sale: 150 000 000  Total tokens: 300 000 000    Stages:      April 9. 2018 - 40% of the AVG tokens      April 16, 2018 - 35% of the AVG tokens      May 23, 2018  - 25% of the AVG tokens    Token Distribution: Immediate (requires Metamask); Bonus round/Airdrop after regular event concluded    Exchange listing: Within 2 weeks after the sale ends    VIDEO WHITEPAPER FAQ PARTICIPATE

Author: AvantGardeRatings
Title: â­ã€ANNã€‘â­ã€ICOã€‘â­AvantGarde Ratings - The leading cryptocurrency rating agency
Body: The AVG 50 is currently free to use, you can find out exactly how by reading our whitepaper and replicating the portfolio for yourself. In the future, however, we will be charging a small fee to funds/individual investors willing to replicate the portfolio.  We do not currently accept any funds under management. Our main purpose is to act as a ratings agency in the cryptocurrency market similarly to S&P, Fitch and others. In the future we plan on opening a mutual fund as stated in our roadmap.
